about_the_game:
This is the Original Soundtrack from the game "ATRI -My Dear Moments"!
It includes 20 BGM composed by Fuminori Matsumoto, as well as a full-size version of the opening theme song "Light Across the Seas" and the ending theme song "Dear Moments".

◆Data Format
WAV：44.1khz/16bit
MP3：320kbps
